Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia green houses built
    Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- The Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia green houses were built in Maengsan and Sinyang counties, South Phyongan Province.
 The houses have a tissue culture room, a cultivation room, and an exhibition room with equipment enough to control temperature, humidity and light with the solar heat and heating system to suit the growing conditions of the flowers.    
 The green houses will help implant more reverence for the peerlessly great men in people in the counties and distribute many more immortal flowers among them.

articles.content:
Greetings to Cuban foreign minister
    Pyongyang, December 31 (KCNA) -- Foreign minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to his Cuban counterpart Pelipe Perez Roque on the occasion of the 43rd anniversary of the victory of the revolution in Cuba.
 The message expressed the Korean people's firm support and solidarity once again to the just cause of the fraternal Cuban people who are struggling in defence of the sovereignty of the country and the socialist gains, smashing the U.S. unwarranted sanctions and blockade against Cuba.    
 Convinced that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two peoples and the two foreign ministries would grow stronger in the future, it wished the Cuban foreign minister a greater success in his responsible work to carry through the external policy tasks of the Communist Party of Cuba.
